full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GIS GNYER GTAD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES BZLOG PA BYA DGRA PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI GNYER GTAD BAR DU 'DI NI BSHAGS PA BYA BA NI KHAS RLANGS BYA LCAM SRING GI BSHAGS PA 'DON TSE GRANGS PHYAG RGYA BDUN NAD MI SO LAS, 'BUM PA SHUD BU BKRA SHIS 'OD ZER GYIS DGRA BO'I DUL PHYIR CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI GNYER GTAD GSUNG SENGGE 'BUM GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
